text: Neot Kedumim - the Biblical Landscape Reserve in Israel ( is a Biblical garden dedicated to the Nature of the Jewish Bible and also a nature preserve located in Ben Shemen Forest and near of the city "Modi'in" on Route 443 (Israel), between Jerusalem and Tel Aviv, Israel. == Other websites == * Neot Kedumim Category:Parks in Israel Category:Israeli culture Category:Central District (Israel)
title: Neot Kedumim
